short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notes, Highlights, Videos, Audios, Articles, Posts, Books in One Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NotesToNotion(formerly called MemoHub) is a Poweful Browser Extensition will export your all notes to Notion.

Notes, Highlights, Videos, Audios, Articles, Posts, Books in One Notion.

Using Notion databases, you can better to manage your notes, and building it into your "second brain".

Features

1. Browser Extension
Browser extension is a important entry point for syncing notes.

2. Notion Authorization
Authorization Notion is the first step in syncing notes.

3. Automatic Synchronous
When sync is enabled, The extension will automatically sync your notes to Notion.

4. Free Notion Template
We provide a set of free basic Notion templates so that you can quickly get started with Memohub

5. Don't Store Your Notes
We do not store your notes, all notes are stored in the Notion Database

6. Manage Notes In Notion
After the notes are synchronized, all notes can be managed twice in Notion

Supports

Now, MemoHub support Apps include:

✔️ Google Keep
✔️ Amazon Kindle (highlights)
✔️ flomo
✔️ Wechat Read highlights (微信读书划线笔记)


Offical Website: 
https://memohub.notionify.net

v0.1.6 - New Feature & Updates: 
1. [Feature] New Powerful Notion Template.
2. [Feature] New Support sync image content in Flomo and Google Keep.
3. [Update] fix some Bugs.
